toydi wrote:

>[...] sometimes, a POST request will cause several resources creation. [...] In this case, which response code is more appropriate to reflect multiple resources creation? 
>
Not part of the HTTP spec, but the 207 Multistatus response defined in 
rfc2518 seems appropriate. I would not be surprised if it was included 
in the next rev of the HTTP spec...


Cheers,
Elias
